2446.text: After reading Stephen Hawking's latest theory of _ I curled up into a corner and cried for three days straight.

2447.text: Before Marilyn Monroe came along, Hugh Hefner wanted _ as the first Playboy centerfold. Unfortunately for everyone, that deal fell through.

2448.text: Damn it feels good to be _.

2449.text: Give me liberty or give me _.

2450.text: Whenever I feel lonely, I put on some Barry White, dress up like _ and dance seductively in front of the mirror.
